block.p: WEBER-David. Of Fort Lee, NJ, on June 17, 2000. Beloved husband of Ruth (nee Kartt). Devoted father of A. Alan Weber and Bennett Kartt Weber. Loving grandfather of Sara, Abigail, Laura, Rebecca, Noel and Jesse. Loving greatgrandfather of Jacob. Services will be held at Wien & Wien, Hackensack, on Tuesday, June 20, 2000, at noon. Should friends desire, contributions to a charity of their choice would be appreciated. For information 800-322-0533.
